TEXT.TITLE: UP-RIGHT INC <UPRI> 4TH QTR OPER NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr five cts vs 29 cts Oper net 151,000 vs 867,000 Revs 12.7 mln vs 14.1 mln Year Oper shr 87 cts vs 52 cts Oper net 2,650,000 vs 1,565,000 Revs 54.7 mln vs 49.1 mln Note: oper data does not include 4th qtr 1986 extraordinary credit of 14,000 dlrs or 4th qtr 1985 extraordinary loss of 139,000 dlrs, or five cts per shr. For year, does not include extraordinary credit of 92,000 dlrs, or three cts per shr, in 1986 and 161,000 dlrs, or five cts per shr, in 1985. Reuter
